message: Let's split a bit more than half-half for me since I am affected by inflation more.
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling the inflation pinch, so I need a bit more this time.
This is my last offer close to a half-half split. The inflation will only get worse for you Bob, take it while you can.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Inflation is eating my share alive. I need a larger cut to make this worthwhile.
